replies.body:
Hey Kacers!

What is/are your New Year's Resolution(s)?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey Kacers!

replies.body:
Hello! 

I don't really set any resolutions. But one of my resolutions would be remain lead off hitter in softball! :o And become a better player, and have a better mindset. c: Sounds pretty cheesy..

replies.body:
It is wonderfulyaymazing. Quite indeed. 

I am bae. 
I do even.
I change skins so much cause I never make my mind up.
Story behind my name - 
My name is Kacie. I would be playing outside with my friends
all the time when I was a young child. My neighbor would always
scream what's up Kacers?! Now everyone calls me Kacers. 
25 is bae so 25.

replies.body:
My name is nothing special, I used to love shadow the hedgehog and was obessed  with the sonic franchise, so my name is in part a tribute to that then I added stuff I thought looked kewl, Z stands for Zephyr and 7 is my favorite # 

You should rly go on the forums more, makes the in-game community more bearable

replies.body:
ShadowSlayer - To be honest I am a bit shy.
I only talk if you get me talking or I'm interested in something you said. That's why I'm not on here a lot. 

EmeraldSword - My dream job is to work in the medical field. I love to help people. C: Preferably anesthesiologist. 

Ky - That's your dream job you silly.
